FrageText.de: In welcher Reihenfolge werden Sie die Handlungen beim sicheren Fahrstreifenwechsel durchführen?
FrageText.en: What is the correct sequence of actions to change lanes safely?
FrageText.hr: Kojim redoslijedom ćete provesti radnje prilikom sigurnog prestrojavanja u drugu prometnu traku?
FrageText.sl: V kakšnem vrstnem redu boste izvajali postopek varne spremembe voznega pasa?
FrageText.tr: Güvenli bir şekilde şerit değiştirmek için, sırasıyla hangi hareketleri yaparsınız?

de.Text: Spiegel-Spiegel-Schulter-Blick - Blinker setzen - Abstände beobachten - Fahrstreifen wechseln
Blinker setzen - Spiegel-Spiegel-Schulter-Blick - Abstände beobachten - Fahrstreifen wechseln

en.Text: Mirror-mirror-shoulder-glance, turn on signal light, watch distances, change lanes
Turn on signal light, mirror-mirror-shoulder-glance, watch distances, change lanes

hr.Text: Pogledati u ogledala i preko ramena - uključiti pokazivač smjera - pogledom pratiti razmake - prestrojiti se u drugu prometnu traku
